textTemplates.name: h_8794927f90f42fa44e9b4dc399fd1758_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY TEst Wait Element" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY TEst Wait Element" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_TEst_Wait_Element
Type: Flow
Version: 2
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY TEst Wait Element
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0
Some of this flow's variables were set when the interview started.
$Record = Account ({!$Record})

(APEX): h_32f6e79cc4a43d5d1f06650e3ff3c9c5_PostPreLog
